EmailTemplate.description: Send from Training Event to all/any new hires
EmailTemplate.name: Learning Plan: Customer Service
EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your Learning Journey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Get started on your Learning Journey!
As part of your new journey with WEX, the Global Training Team has developed self-directed and self-paced Learning Plans to jump start your success in your new role.
Your Phase I Learning Plan can be found here:
PHASE I: Get to know WEX https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MSbGdaiqFVx0TLURiBqczsu-LDH7xfCgBSltasuiM8g/preview
Complete this Learning Plan and Knowledge Check within the next two weeks.
Thank You,
{!User.Name} WEX University Global Training
